front.title: VPN Service Management YANG Data Model

abstract.t: Currently new services create new opportunities for both network providers and service providers. Simplified Use of Policy Abstractions (SUPA) was proposed to develop a model that abstracts network resources and services and a methodology by which the management and monitoring of network services can be done using standardized policy rules. This document defines a VPN service management yang data model and gives an example for DDC use case.
